General.Name: Alexandria Group Oyj
General.Description: Alexandria Pankkiiriliike Oyj provides investment and saving solutions to individuals and companies in Finland. The company acts as an insurance agent. It is also involved in the management of investment funds; and organizing and selling the issuance of structured investment products, as well as specializing in business financing, which provides crowdfunding in the form of loans from investors to companies. The company was incorporated in 1996 and is based in Helsinki, Finland.
